17using System;
18using UnityEngine;
22public static class Extensions
23{
30 public static Component GetOrAddComponent(this GameObject go, Type componentType)
31 {
32 var result = go.GetComponent(componentType);
33 return result == null ? go.AddComponent(componentType) : result;
34 }
35
42 public static T GetOrAddComponent<T>(this GameObject go) where T : Component
43 {
44 return GetOrAddComponent(go, typeof(T)) as T;
45 }
46
52 public static float Volume(this Mesh mesh)
53 {
54 float volume = 0;
55 var vertices = mesh.vertices;
56 var triangles = mesh.triangles;
57 for (var i = 0; i < mesh.triangles.Length; i += 3)
58 {
59 var p1 = vertices[triangles[i + 0]];
60 var p2 = vertices[triangles[i + 1]];
61 var p3 = vertices[triangles[i + 2]];
62 volume += SignedVolumeOfTriangle(p1, p2, p3);
63 }
64
65 return Mathf.Abs(volume);
66 }
67
74 private static float SignedVolumeOfTriangle(Vector3 p1, Vector3 p2, Vector3 p3)
75 {
76 var v321 = p3.x * p2.y * p1.z;
77 var v231 = p2.x * p3.y * p1.z;
78 var v312 = p3.x * p1.y * p2.z;
79 var v132 = p1.x * p3.y * p2.z;
80 var v213 = p2.x * p1.y * p3.z;
81 var v123 = p1.x * p2.y * p3.z;
82 return (1.0f / 6.0f) * (-v321 + v231 + v312 - v132 - v213 + v123);
83 }
84}
Extensions
Class, which functions are utilized by the MeshManipulation and the GameManager.
